body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. a creature died in battle
2. "Havengul Vampire" ability should trigger What is the expected output? What do you see instead? "Havengul Vampire" should get a +1/+1 marker but got an -1/-1 marker instead.

I looked in the source java file, there is something called MagicCounter.MinusOne which seems to be the problem. :) What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.27 von WinXP SP3
